sentences.sContent: He reacted angrily to the suggestion that he had lied.
She reacted very badly (= was very upset ) when her parents split up.
sentences.sCn: 父母离婚的时候，她非常难过。

sentences.sContent: You have to react quickly to circumstances.
sentences.sCn: 你必须对形势迅速作出反应。

synos.tran: 反应；影响；反抗；起反作用

phrases.pCn: v. 起作用于；对…有影响

remMethod.val: re(反的) + act(行动， 表现) → 作出反应

words.tran: 反应，感应；反动，复古；反作用
[化工] 反应器；[核] 反应堆；起反应的人
[物化] 再活化；再生；复能的情况；[核] 重激活
极端保守主义；反动思想

trans.tranCn: 反应；影响；反抗；起反作用
trans.tranOther: to behave in a particular way or show a particular emotion because of something that has happened or been said
